title: VCMI map object template format
description: Description of map object tempate that describes appearence of object instance

animation.description: Path to def file with animation of this object

editorAnimation.description: Optional path to def file with animation of this object to use in map editor

visitableFrom.description: Directions from which this object is visible

allowedTerrains.description: List of terrain on which this object can be placed

mask.description: Object mask that describes on which tiles object is visible/blocked/activatable

zIndex.description: Defines order in which objects on same tile will be blit.
